messages.label: error

exceptions.message: Call to undefined relationship [creator] on model [App\Reply].

hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
The SELECT statement has no WHERE clause and could examine many more rows than intended
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: select "threads".*, (select count(*) from "replies" where "threads"."id" = "replies"."thread_id") as "replies_count" from "threads" where "id" = '1' limit 1
hints: LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: select count(*) as aggregate from "replies" where "replies"."thread_id" = '1' and "replies"."thread_id" is not null
select * from "replies" where "replies"."thread_id" = '1' and "replies"."thread_id" is not null limit 20 offset 0
hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan
